title: California to Require Covid-19 Vaccines for All Eligible Students
sub_head: Statewide mandate, first of its kind in the U.S., to take effect after FDA grants full approval for vaccine for people aged 12 and older
body:
All eligible students in California will be required to get vaccinated against Covid-19, Gov. Gavin Newsom said Friday, marking the first such mandate in a U.S. state.
“We need to do more, and we need to do better,” he said.
